name: The Outsiders
description: The Outsiders is a sci-fi top-down survival shooter, a fun little indie game where you play as the Alien Boss slaying humans who are invading your planet! Be the Boss, destroy multiple enemies with a single blow or all of them with your badass power!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB dedicated video memory Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 2.4GHz Dual Core Memory: 6 MB RAM Graphics: 2 GB dedicated video memory Storage: 1 GB available space
